text:
Chino.io | Dev, DevOps, SysAdmin, Sales, Biz Dev | Trento, Italy & Berlin | Full Time | ONSITE (Remote can be discussed)

We're building a Backend As a Service to store health data in compliance with GDPR and HIPAA. We just got a round of investment and we are growing the team. Offices are in Trento, Italy (Dev team) and Berlin (Biz/Sales). Remote can be discussed if within EU.

Compensation highly depends on experience and role and your needs. More info can be found here https://chino.io/careers

Mention that you find the jobpost on HN
